title: New: Dirty Projectors – Gun Has No Trigger
body:
I’m sitting in my flat with a big ass man flu brewing, having watched a video of blatant police racism, with a completely empty stomach; it’s safe to say I’m in appalling mood.

And then this popped up on my Facebook feed, the new track from legendry indie group,**[Dirty Projectors](https://www.facebook.com/dirtyprojectors)**, a track supposedly taken from their Domino release rumored to be released this year. It’s perhaps not a brave step in a different direction, yet it’s a blown up, croon filled jam in its own right.

Stream it below.
